name: yieldfinity

scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && cp README.md package.json package-lock.json ./dist/ && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && cp README.md package.json package-lock.json ./dist/ && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && cp README.md package.json package-lock.json ./dist/ && cd dist && npm publish

description: A strategy backtester/runner for trading / cryptotrading
